about:
Welcome to Governance Voting DApp. This Web Application (The DApp) empowers you to participate in the governance of our community by voting on proposals or creating text proposals for consideration. The DApp is hosted by our organization, ixo.world AG, Liechtenstein (The Company).
The Company does not charge you for using The DApp and does not collect any of your personal information.
The DApp is provided for your personal use only, for the purpose of interacting with and learning about Web3 networks and the Internet of Impact.
By using The DApp, you accept and agree to be bound by The Company's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
You agree that you will not use the website for any illegal purpose, or in violation of any local, state, national, or international law.
Please be aware that The DApp is provided 'as is' and 'as available,' without any warranties or conditions of any kind.
You agree to indemnify The Company against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses and expenses, including reasonable attorneys' fees and costs, arising out of or in any way connected with your access to or use of The DApp App; Your User Content; Your violation of the Terms of Use; or Your willful misconduct.
Should you not be in agreement with these Terms, we kindly ask that you refrain from using The DApp.
You may contact the developers of This DApp by email assistant@ixo.world.
